full_summary:
**Project Title**
Strategic Tanker Transport Capability (STTC) Project In-Service Support Second Virtual Industry Engagement Session

**Tender Details**

* **Solicitation Number**: W847A-200275/J
* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01028806
* **Publication Date**: March 3, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 30, 2023, 3:00 PM EDT

**Background and Context**

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is hosting a second Virtual Industry Engagement Session to update Canadian industry and stakeholders on the long-term In-Service Support (ISS) requirement for the STTC project.

**Virtual Industry Engagement Session Details**

* **Date and Time**: March 15, 2023, 9:00 AM – 10:00 AM EDT
* **Format**: Virtual session using Zoom and Slido platforms
* **Registration**: Required online registration by sending an email to tpsgc.paastr-apsttc.pwgsc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca with representative details
* **Registration Deadline**: March 13, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT

**Goals and Objectives**

The virtual session aims to:

* Update industry on Canada's progress in developing the STTC Long-Term ISS strategy
* Establish conditions for meaningful one-on-one sessions
* Obtain industry feedback on the preferred sustainment strategy (multiple contracts)
* Seek industry interest regarding different proposed work packages
* Solicit feedback on proposed scope of work within work packages

**Next Steps**

Following the virtual session, PSPC intends to hold one-on-one sessions in early April 2023. Interested parties must send an email request to tpsgc.paastr-apsttc.pwgsc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca, including representative details and a request for a one-on-one session. One-on-one sessions will be confirmed when industry engagement timelines are established.

**Contact Information**

* **Michelle Roberge-Butcher**
* **Email**: tpsgc.paastr-apsttc.pwgsc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: Not provided
* **Fax**: Not provided
* **Address**: Not provided

**Attachment**

The tender description is attached in French as QR Mars 2023 - modif 001.pdf and English as QA March 2023 - Amendment 001.pdf, available at https://canadabuys.canada
